price: 19. (The angel) said: "I am only a messenger from your Lord, (to announce) to you the gift of a righteous son."
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ رَسُولُ رَبِّكِ لِأَهَبَ لَكِ غُلَٰمٗا زَكِيّٗا

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: qāla innamā anā rasūlu rabbiki li-ahaba laki ghulāman zakiyyan
